00023 W.refresh = function(){
00024   var db = document.body;
00025   if(window.innerWidth != null){
00026     this.width = window.innerWidth;
00027     this.height = window.innerHeight;
00028   }else if(window.opera != null){
00029     this.width = db.clientWidth;
00030     this.height = db.clientHeight;
00031   }else if(document.documentElement != null){  // IE or others
00032     this.width = document.documentElement.clientWidth;
00033     this.height = document.documentElement.clientHeight;
00034   }
00035   // store in Int-type
00036   this.width = parseInt(this.width);
00037   this.height = parseInt(this.height);
00038   // inherit the browser workspace size onto the W.body
00039   this.body.style.width = this.width +'px';
00040   this.body.style.height = this.height +'px';
00041 };

00052 W.scroll = function(isAuto){
00053   if(isAuto){
00054     document.write('<style>html {overflow-x: auto;overflow-y: auto;}<\/style>');
00055   }else document.write('<style>html {overflow-x: hidden;overflow-y: hidden; '
00056     +'overflow: hidden;}<\/style>');
00057   document.close();
00058 };

00061 W.background = function(bg){
00062   if(!bg) return;
00063   document.body.style.background = bg;
00064 };
00065

00075 W.init = function(){
00076   // build initial namespace library
00077   for(var i in window) W.names += i +',';
00078 
00079   // append the mother of all presentation layers
00080   this.body = document.createElement('div');
00081   // has no footprint
00082   this.body.style.display = 'inline';
00083   // trick: get document.body ready
00084   if(!document.body){
00085     document.write('<div id="_wednus_platform_" style="display:none;'
00086     +'position:absolute;">.</div>');
00087   }
00088   document.body.appendChild(this.body);
00089 
00090   // code holder: handles issue eval backslash contains string
00091   this.code = document.createElement('textarea');
00092   this.code.style.display = 'none';
00093   document.body.appendChild(this.code);
00094   // auto scrollbars
00095   this.scroll(false);
00096   // update workspace size
00097   this.refresh();
00098 
00099   // get path if it's from wednus_compact.js loading
00100   if(this.path == '') this.autopath();
00101 };
00102 
00104 // by doing this, we can block 'i' being exposed to the global namespace
00105 (function(){
00106   // width of workspace
00107   W.width = 0;
00108   // height of workspace
00109   W.height = 0;
00110   // script confliction checker place holder
00111   W.check_namespace = function(){};
00112   // initialize system
00113   W.init();
00114   W.load('module/dkernel', 'wes,wml,wss,wrs,serialize', 'module');
00115 })();
